description: Try our easy to follow Ravioli With Lemony Spinach & Ricotta recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Stuffed pasta,Quick & easy dinner,Soy free,Tree nut free,Quick & easy lunch,Lemon,Chicken,Sesame free,Spinach,Peanut free
name: Ravioli With Lemony Spinach & Ricotta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 lemon, juiced and rind finely grated

recipeInstructions.text: Cook ravioli as per pack instructions.
Meanwhile, heat oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Add onion and cook for 3 minutes or until softened. Add spinach and toss for 2 minutes or until just wilted.
Drain ravioli and add to spinach with lemon rind, juice, ricotta and dill. Season to taste. Gently toss to combine. Transfer to serving bowls. Drizzle with extra oil and sprinkle with parmesan.
